In addition, the engine leasing business is deeply engaged in supporting the engine OEMs in the introduction of new technologies The conversion of a passenger aircraft to a cargo aircraft extends the useful life of the aircraft to ~35 years
Dedicated cargo aircraft tend to have lower utilisation than passenger aircraft, thus reducing the volume of emissions being produced by that converted aircraft during its life
Our Materials business has a dedicated dismantlement facility which is ISO and AFRA- certified 
Correct and safe dismantling of an aircraft ensures that rotable and reparable parts are reused and that the expendable parts of an aircraft are properly recycled and returned to the supply chain as raw materials, contributing significantly to the circular economy
